## Introduction

Vizio TV Screen Mirror is a feature that allows you to connect and mirror your smartphone or tablet screen to your Vizio TV. This feature is useful for viewing photos, videos, or playing a game on a larger screen. In this article, we will show you how to connect and mirror your screen to your Vizio TV.

## Requirements

To use the Vizio TV Screen Mirror feature, you will need the following:

- A Vizio TV with SmartCast technology (2016 and later models)
- A smartphone or tablet running Android 4.4.2 or later or iOS 9.1 or later
- The Vizio SmartCast app (available on the App Store or Google Play)
- A stable Wi-Fi connection

Alternatively, you can use a Chromecast device or an HDMI cable to mirror your screen to your Vizio TV.

## Connect and Mirror with Vizio SmartCast App

1. Connect your smartphone or tablet to the same Wi-Fi network as your Vizio TV.
2. Open the Vizio SmartCast app on your device.
3. Tap the Cast icon (rectangle with Wi-Fi waves) in the top right corner of the app.
4. Select your Vizio TV from the list of available devices.
5. Tap the Screen Mirroring option.
6. Follow the on-screen instructions to start mirroring your device screen to your Vizio TV.

Note: The Vizio SmartCast app also allows you to stream content directly to your Vizio TV from popular apps like Netflix, Hulu, and YouTube.

## Connect and Mirror with Chromecast

If you do not have a Vizio TV with SmartCast technology, you can use a Chromecast device to mirror your screen.

1. Connect your Chromecast to your Vizio TV.
2. Connect your smartphone or tablet to the same Wi-Fi network as your Chromecast.
3. Open the Google Home app on your device.
4. Tap the Cast icon (rectangle with Wi-Fi waves) in the top right corner of the app.
5. Select your Chromecast from the list of available devices.
6. Follow the on-screen instructions to start mirroring your device screen to your Vizio TV.

## Connect and Mirror with HDMI Cable

You can also use an HDMI cable to connect and mirror your device screen to your Vizio TV.

1. Connect your smartphone or tablet to your TV using an HDMI cable.
2. Select the HDMI input on your Vizio TV that matches the HDMI port you used to connect your device.
3. Follow the on-screen instructions to start mirroring your device screen to your Vizio TV.

## Conclusion

Vizio TV Screen Mirror is a convenient feature that allows you to view your smartphone or tablet screen on a larger screen. You can use the Vizio SmartCast app, Chromecast, or HDMI cable to connect and mirror your screen to your TV. Make sure to have a stable Wi-Fi connection and follow the instructions carefully to ensure a seamless mirroring experience.
